Text.Value: There you are.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer
EditorData.NodeContext: Genuine quiet pride in Karlach, who turned into a mindflayer to save the city (and now gets to live)

Text.Value: You did it. You saw the price of freedom and decided to pay it. I - ... I'm proud of you. Well done.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer
EditorData.NodeContext: [Spawn path] A little bittersweet - Karlach's free, but she had to become a mind flayer

Text.Value: It's like I'm beyond myself. I can sense things I never knew were there...
Yes... and no. But somehow I think this was intended. Maybe not the tentacles, but... something else.
I get to be alive. I get to stay.
I feel your mind, Karlach. It is immense - it is beautiful.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer
EditorData.NodeContext: in awe - karlach just became a mind flayer, and Minthara is in awe of her

Text.Value: Be it with horns or tentacles, I am glad you have a future to look forward to, Karlach.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer

Text.Value: I'm going to...
You will live, Karlach! It will take some time to restore your muscles to their former glory, but Minsc and Boo shall train with you, every day!

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer

Text.Value: It may be different than I thought. But I can feel. Think. Exist.
Hells, you actually did it. I'm... happy for you? I think.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer
EditorData.NodeContext: [Vampire Lord Astarion] a little taken aback Karlach would actually become a mind flayer, but cautiously happy for her. Even if it's not a trade you'd ever make.

Text.Value: I never thought I'd be happy to hear a ghaik will live. Yet my heart is very glad, Karlach.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer

Text.Value: Oh, Karlach. No news could have made me happier in this house of horrors.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer

Text.Value: I'm still the same, aren't I? I'm still me...?
I'm going to live.
First: defeat the Netherbrain. Then: live.
Infinite permutations. Infinite possibilities. Before, they'd have driven me mad. Now, I can see them all.
My years in the Hells, my escape, every step I've taken from the shattered nautiloid to this place among infinite stars - all of it has brought me to my destiny.
Lady Shar's oblivion awaits us all in the end... but I am glad you'll be able to enjoy a taste of life beforehand, Karlach.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer
EditorData.NodeContext: Arc: SH is loyal to Shar. Commenting on Karlach surviving her terminal condition by becoming a mind flayer

Text.Value: Like I'm finally complete.
It's an unorthodox way of cheating death... but if you're happy, I'm glad for you.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer
EditorData.NodeContext: Arc: SH turned from Shar. Commenting on Karlach surviving her terminal condition by becoming a mind flayer

Text.Value: No pain. No gears. A calm I haven't felt in a decade - or ever.
Fuck. Yes.

EditorData.NodeContext: The real Karlach experience breaking through the mind flayer cool for a moment.

Text.Value: I've never felt better.
And my engine. It's... it's... silent. Still there, but no longer threatening to explode.
I think your new form rather suits you. It has a certain... cephalopodic charm to it. A tentacular tingle.

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer

Text.Value: This means I'm going to live.
Strange. I'm myself... but more.

Synopsis: Avatar Karlach reflects on becoming a full mind flayer in END.
